Class Comment

java.lang.Object
fr.polytech.picknpic.bl.models.Comment
public class Comment extends Object
Represents a comment in the Pick'n'Pic application. A comment can be associated with a post, photo, or another comment.

  • Constructor Summary

    • Comment

      public Comment()
      Constructs a new Comment instance with default values.

    • Comment

      public Comment(int id, int userId, int postId, int photoId, int commentId, String text, int nbLikes, int nbReplies, Date creationDate, List<Comment> replies)
      Constructs a new Comment instance with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the comment.
      userId - The ID of the user who created the comment.
      postId - The ID of the post that the comment is associated with.
      photoId - The ID of the photo that the comment is associated with.
      commentId - The ID of the comment that this comment is replying to.
      text - The text content of the comment.
      nbLikes - The number of likes the comment has received.
      nbReplies - The number of replies to the comment.
      creationDate - The date the comment was created.
      replies - The list of replies to the comment.
